name: High Speed Car racing
description:
Do you love car racing while a crazy traffic on the roads?? Well then download High Speed Car Racing and get the unique experience of driving high velocity luxury cars throughout the most mesmerizing scenes on the earth. It’s time to start the engines and hit the road. A mixture of easy & Challenging racing tracks and distance to cover and beat your opponent. Do you have what it takes to be the King of speed then show what you made of. Driving the most exotic sport cars of the 21st Century you must win every single race to earn your pride. Strike your opponents by winning and leaving them behind to eat the dust.
***GAME FEATURES***

**POWER UPS**

* Use nitro to boost and leave opponents hanging behind.
* Hit the ramp and be the King of speed.
* Get powered up and hit any car to destroy them.
* Transform to a complete new car while hitting the ramp.

**CHALLENGES**

* Beat your opponents with a specified distance given to you at every level.
* Police chases can also occur during your race.
* It’s the cities rush hour so beat the traffic and move closer to the finish line.

**STORE**

* Don’t forget to upgrade your cars to make them invincible.
* Customize your cars and give them a more exotic look.
* No fuel No problem. So just keep moving and keep winning.

Please do rate our game you reviews mean a lot to us.
